response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value and significance, which aligns perfectly with your interests and needs, just like it has for many satisfied clients before you. Given its exceptional quality and rarity, we understand its true worth is $800,000. To make this offer even more compelling, I am extending a special introductory price of $750,000 for you, ensuring you secure a remarkable deal. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exceptional offer.", "product_price": 750000}
